sources.title: Dooratwa (1981)
sources.description: Dooratwa  (English:  Distance ) is a  1981   Bengali   film  directed and written by  Buddhadev Dasgupta .  It won the  National film award for best feature film in bengali .

metadata.Plot: A professor in Kolkata marries a young woman. But when he learns that she is pregnant with someone else's child, he decides to leave her.
metadata.Writer: Arupratan Basu, Buddhadev Dasgupta, Sirshendu Mukhopadhyay
metadata.Actors: Mamata Shankar, Pradip Mukherjee, Ajoy Banerjee
